name: Wash My Hands
description:
TrainJam 2017 Theme

Unexpected Anticipation

Controls

  • Dual analog thumbsticks.
  • Press ENTER or A to start

Developed and tested on Xbox 360 controllers. If you don't have one, use WASD + arrow keys.
